entry.title: 2014 Initial Goals
entry.content:
To usher in the new year, I making am note of my goals for 2014 and will continue to adjust the list as needed. My motivation to document my milestones began one day on Quora when I came across Karen Cheng’s response to ‘How do you get a job as a designer without going to design school?’, and her other online pursuits such as Giveit100 and her viral ‘Girl learns to Dance in a Year’ video. Ultimately, I was and am convinced that to increase my proactiveness will lead to a better me in 2014.

  • Practice colloquial chinese by reading the comic book 小貝貝
  • Make a parallax page or use a technique found on http://csswizardry.com/work/
  • Finish tasks for IEEE Fall 2014: Facebook + Google Calendar + Rails Admin Integration
  • Finish Reading Smart Thinking
  • Complete Adobe CIB Illustrator
  • Complete Adobe CIB Photoshop
  • 50 yelp reviews
  • Complete You Can Draw in 30 Days
  • Read 7 Effective Habits of Highly Effective People
  • Get to 180 pounds with a fitness routine
  • Apply to Innovative Design
